ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT($Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Deal_V1', ISCHANGED(EBH_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c, 'Planned'), DATETIMEVALUE(Deal_Start_Date_Time__c+':00') < NOW(), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator - Limited Privileges', $Profile.Name <> 'Business Admin' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Deal cannot be planned for the past date.
